choices: Before his visits to those worlds
His first time on Holy Terra
He decides to start reliving at some other point
1.content: The First Stranger was meditating on his past one day, and decided to relive it. His first choice was to relive his biological 20s, when he was first seen on dozens of worlds and timelines.....
1.title: The Beginning of the Insanity

14.content: He thought to himself:"Nah, I'll start with somewhen else, maybe when I fired the global shot."
14.title: He decides to start reliving at some other point

choices: You say you want a REVOLUTION?
141.content: The Stranger thought to himself:"Yes, Lexington sounds good; I'll start there."
141.title: Shot Heard 'Round the World

1411.content:
I and 9 of my selves were busy meditating and coordinating the colonization of Mobius-12 by human beings when I, the First Stranger, opened my eyes and whispered:"It is time, my brothers. Now, let us go and assist the colonists, shall we?" We then rose, donned our militia uniforms and tricorn hats, strapped our VoxRifles to our backs, walked out of our colonial Manhattan safehouse, and teleported to a hill overlooking a certain bridge leading to Lexington, Massachusetts. We then set up camp, and waited for the minutemen and Redcoats to arrive...
The date was April 19, 1775 A.D. Today, the history of Mankind would change forever...
1411.title: Preparing for a Revolution

choices: You pick (make your own chapter name, alright?)
15.content: He then remembered all those times where he interrupted the course of parallel universes and shows... "Hmmm... which shall I start with first? So many to choose from!"
15.title: The Interruption Series

151.content:
He decided to screw up Battlestar Galactica:"Heh, this should be fun!"

Meanwhile, on the Colonial Battlestar Galactica...
"Commander, we've got a DRADIS contact!" Commander Adama:"Launch the alert Vipers, all hands action stations!"
Deana then announced:"Wait, I'm picking up a transponder signal, but it's not a Colonial one." Tigh then demanded:"Well, if it's not Cylon and it's not Colonial, then what the frak is it?!" Adama then asked Deana:"Hail the ship, see if we can't make contact." "Yes, sir!" Commander Adama then picked up the phone:"Unknown vessel, this is the Battlestar Galactica. Identify yourself or be fired upon!" The CAG then heard a reply over the wireless:"Galactica Actual, this is the Earth ship Continuum Est. I'd very much like to meet with you, Commander. Permission to dock in your portside landing bay?" The entire CAG was immediately stunned to hear that this ship came from, of all places, Earth. Adama then recovered, and answered the Continuum Est:"Continuum Est, you are clear to dock." He then spoke to the entire Colonial fleet:"Attention all ships, the unknown vessel claims to be from the planet Earth. I say again, we have encountered an Earth vessel!" The entire Colonial fleet was stunned into silence, then broke out into massive celebrations as they realized that they have found part of the Thirteenth Tribe. Back in Galactica's CAG, the crewmen were still cheering when Deana announced to Commander Adama:"Sir, I'm receiving a signal from our alert Vipers. You should hear this, sir!" Adama picked up the phone, and said:"Galactica, Actual, go ahead." "Sir, you should see this thing! It's bigger than any ship I've ever seen, and you should see these fighters!" Adama was puzzled, and asked:"Kat, what fighters? DRADIS isn't picking up anything other than the one Earth ship." Kat paused a moment, then replied:"Sir, did you just say this huge thing came from Earth?! I got to admit, sir, that makes a lot of sense; these birds look more advanced than ANYTHING we've probably even thought of!" Then, Deana interrupted:"Sir, the Earth ship's shuttle has landed in the port docking bay." Adama:"Good. Saul, notify Colonial One and alert the President that she should be there when we meet these people." Colonel Tigh acknowledged him:"Right, Bill, I'll tell her." Commander Adama and Colonel Tigh then proceeded to the docking bay, and were joined by President Laura Roslin along the way:"So, we've finally found someone from Earth. Now that we know it does exist, hopefully this ship will be able to take us there. What did the captian say it was called, again?" Adama answered her:"The Continuum Est. Strange name, but we have been apart our entire histories, so the Thirteenth was probably bound to be completely different from us." They reached the docking bay to see the giant, heavily armed Earth shuttle land. The crew of the entire deck had come with the three of them to witness the twelve worlds' first contact with the Thirteenth Tribe...
151.title: Meeting some guys from Earth

choices: Follow the Stranger, Adama, and President Roslin
Stay with the other Earth men in the landing bay.
Jump to someone else on the Galactica?
1511.content: An out came several men in an advanced, golden armor, all but one of whom were wearing golden helmets. The Colonials noticed that the Earth men's armor each a an odd, two-headed golden eagle on their torsos. The brown-haired man stepped off the shuttle, extending his hand to the President, saying:"Good to meet you, ma'am, Commander, you may call me the Stranger, for now." Adama, curious, asks:"Why are you called the Stranger? And, why are you people all wearing armor? And why are you the only one with their helmet off?" The Stranger answered the Commander:"I am called that because it's my favorite title and the others would freak you out. We all wear armor because it's cool and protects us better than your flak jackets ever could. As to why I'm the only Earth man here NOT wearing a helmet, it's because you WON'T like what you see under their helmets." Laura Roslin then interrupted, also curious:"Why? I mean, what's the problem?" The Stranger answered her:"Well, Madame President, they look just like me, and ARE me! Want to see? Boys, show 'em your faces, if you please!" The Earth men in the shuttle then removed their helmets to show that the Stranger was, in fact, telling the truth! Several of Galactica's crew immediately fainted, and Adama shouted:"CYLONS!" Every armed Colonial in the bay drew their guns and aimed at the identical Earth men. The Stranger put up his hands in alarm, saying:"Whoa, whoa! Look, we're NOT Cylons, okay? Yes, we know about the frakking skinjob imitators in your fleet, but we're SO NOT THEM. We've actually been CHASING the damned bastards all over this half of the galaxy, AND we can PROVE that we're fully human, alright? Now, may I please get a tour of your ship before someone here blows my FUCKING head off?! Hmmm? It won't hurt for you to just let me look around, now could it? In the meantime, the other mes here will be happy to answer your questions and compare our two peoples' technology, if you're curious." Adama answered hi:"Sure, it couldn't hurt. Come with us, then, Stranger." The Stranger then answered:"Great! I'll be waiting for you outside, then", and walked out of the hanger bay. Adama then pointed to two marines nearby:"You two, stay on this guy AT ALL TIMES, understand? Now, let's go." The President, Adama, and their marines then walked out to catch up with the Stranger. The identical Earth men then announced to the fuming Colonials below them:"Attention, crew of the Galactica and you other people, we will now take any questions you may have!" With that, the entire room began clamoring to ask questions of the men from Earth.
1511.title: The most AWESOME MEETING EVER!

1553.content: How about the time he fought the reptilian aliens known only as the Race over control of planet Earth? (Inspired by Harry Turtledove's Worldwar series). Or when he went to Skyrim, or maybe the world of Avatar (not James Cameron's Pandora).
1553.title: More Options of Interruptions to Remember

choices: One of the two Avatar shows
15533.content: The universe of the show Avatar, perhaps?
15533.title: Avatar TLA Interrupted, and more

155332.content: Victorian London of some kind, or more?
155332.title: Victorian London

1553321.content: So, Black Butler, Sherlock Holmes, what? I'm not always patient when it comes to indecision-making, even with myself.
1553321.title: Victorian London

15533211.content:
London, England, 1887

It was a cloudy night in the city of London, and the various criminal elements were out performing their usual activities when a man in a blue and brown longcoat walked up to several opium dealers and simply said: "It looks like rain tonight, doesn't it, you vermin of men." The leader of this specific group of then drew a revolver from his belt and aimed it at this newcomer, and was then blasted into molecules as the Stranger Shouted FUS... RO DAH! at the drug dealer, which terrified the other criminals, who were also then Shouted upon, except for one. The Stranger then glared at the surviving dealer and said: "Now then, scum, tell people about what you have seen here tonight, and what I am about to do, for you have seen the power of the ancient dragons unleashed." The Stranger then looked to the sky and Shouted, "Strum! Bah! Qo!" With that, he walked away from the confounded man as thunder began to rumble through London's night sky and said: "Yes, it does look like rain tonight." He then walked out of the alley and vanished into the night...

To Be Continued
15533211.title: A Dovahkiin in the Queen's London

info.brief_description: These are the stories of the First Stranger. His continuing mission? He just goes with it!
info.description:
This is the tale of the Almighty First Stranger, a human diety with a long, troubling, and confusing past.
Rules:No pregnancy, no Harry Potter. Other people's characters are welcome and encouraged.
